movieList.title: MovieList App
movieList.short: Explore and save your favorite movies with MovieList.
movieList.modal: MovieList is a Full-Stack application built with the MERN stack and technologies such as Next.js and TypeScript. It allows you to manage your personal movie collection, explore global catalogs, and filter movies by genre, year, or format. User authentication is secured with Passport.js and JWT.
movieList.description: App to explore, save, and manage your favorite movies.
features: Movie Management: Full CRUD for movies in the personal collection.
Global Catalog: Browse movies and add them to your collection.
Filters and Search: Find titles by genre, year, or format.
User Authentication: Login/registration with Passport.js and JWT.
Modern Frontend: Intuitive UI with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
Robust Backend: RESTful API with Node.js, Express, and patterns like DTO/DAO.

clinicLab.title: Clinic Lab
clinicLab.short: Manage patients, appointments, and results in clinical laboratories.
clinicLab.modal: Clinic Lab is a Full-Stack application developed with Next.js, TypeScript, MongoDB, and other modern technologies. It enables managing patients, scheduling appointments, and recording lab results in an intuitive way.
clinicLab.description: Clinical app for managing appointments and lab results.
features: Patient Management: Add, edit, and delete patients.
Appointment Scheduling: Calendar with available dates.
Result Recording: Lab test results linked to each patient.
Authentication: Login with JWT and user roles.
Modern UI: Responsive interface with Tailwind CSS.
Landing Page: Informative homepage built with React and Tailwind CSS.
Backend: Access control and persistence with MongoDB.
